Title: Adele Contemporary Metallic Eastern King Bed
Description: Sleep in glamorous style with the Adele Contemporary Metallic Eastern King Bed, featuring a gleaming platinum finish, individually applied chrome nailhead accents, and decorative mirrors for a dramatic, gleaming look. With its durable construction, this piece will add opulent style and exceptional comfort for years to come. Combine with the Adele nightstand to build a cohesive, lavish look that also offers convenient storage.
Materials: Fabric, poplar, rubberwood, plywood and MDF
Property 6: Headboard and footboard panels upholstered in metallic leatherette
